alert.note: Alert for McCormick; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:04PM EST until January 12 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EST FOR NORTHERN EDGEFIELD...NORTHERN AIKEN...SOUTH CENTRAL SALUDA AND NORTHEASTERN MCCORMICK COUNTIES... At 703 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edgefield, or 21 miles west of Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Monetta, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Cleora, Harmony, Pleasant Lane, Northside Fire Station Main and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
